Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 81st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1967...
Injured on 5/28/1968 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/1971 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1976...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 2/20/1976 (Going to STL: 1B W. Upshaw, C T. Pena Sr.. Going to CHC: P S. Eddy)...
Had first career hit on 10/4/1981, off Jackson Todd (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/1982, off Scott McGregor (ATL)...
